properties.areaDesc: Jefferson, AL; Walker, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 7:46AM CST until February 8 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Locust Fork At Sayre Affecting Jefferson...Tuscaloosa and Walker
Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches with locally heavier
amounts have fallen over the Locust Fork basin...and a flood warning
is now in effect for the Locust Fork at Sayre.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Locust Fork At Sayre.
* from this afternoon to Saturday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  7:00 AM Thursday The stage Was 20.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to
rise to near 34 feet by Friday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 25 feet...Flooding of low lying wood lands and
agricultural lands along the Locust Fork occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
